name: extendable-yeoman
description: Create Yeoman generators that support extensions and dynamic sub-generators automatically.

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm test
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run lint-tests && npm run compile
scripts.test: npm run lint-tests && mocha -R spec --compilers js:babel-register 'test/**/*.js'
scripts.precoverage: npm run lint && npm run lint-tests && npm run compile
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R spec --compilers js:babel-register test/**/*.js
